definitions.definition: A member of any of a group of Protestant churches or denominations in the Anabaptist tradition, practicing credobaptism and committed to nonresistance and nonviolence , many of whom may wear plain dress and shun modern technology .

main_definition: A member of any of a group of Protestant churches or denominations in the Anabaptist tradition, practicing credobaptism and committed to nonresistance and nonviolence , many of whom may wear plain dress and shun modern technology .
